content: the squares are joined as pictured above begin to shape the bag fold it as pictured here with the right side ultimately facing out finishing the bag with color b start at the right corner at the top of the bag and half_double_crochet into each st along the edge of the first square continue this around the entire top of the bag and st st to the first st to join half_double_crochet in first st chain 50 skip the edges of the 2 squares at the front and half_double_crochet into the next corner space half_double_crochet in each st until you reach the next corner space on the other side of the bag chain 50 skip the edges of the 2 squares facing you and slip_stitch into the next corner space sl in each remaining st along the side and slip_stitch to the first st to join see images on next page as needed pattern continued finishing the bag continued half_double_crochet in each st and chain around slip_stitch to the first st to join fo and weave in all remaining ends got extra granny squares the aio skeins actually make 15 squares see below for bonus instructions to use up those last couple of squares mini drawstring bag work the last 2 granny squares as normal with color a with color b join the squares as follows hold the 2 squares lined up with wrong sides facing in starting at the top left corner space and working through both squares to join them together slip_stitch into each st and space down the left side around the bottom and up the right side leaving one side unworked you should wind up in the adjacent corner space do not fo continuing with the working yarn ch4 counts as double_crochet and ch1 double_crochet into the next 3 double_crochet of the square working across the first square *double_crochet into each double_crochet and ch1 over each ch1* creating gaps when you reach the other corner space work 1 double_crochet into the gap on each side leaving you with 2 at the end repeat * * across the second square and work 1 double_crochet into the corner at the end you should have 2 double_crochet at either end in the corners slip_stitch to join work another round of double_crochet into each st and space around fo and weave in ends chain the desired amount to create a drawstring long enough to reach around the bag weave it back and forth through the gaps created store small items cinch closed and enjoy
